title: FS: T205 Frank Chance PSA Authentic Cycle Back
author: TT40391

posts.post_title: FS: T205 Frank Chance PSA Authentic Cycle Back
posts.post_content: Hello everyone I have a T205 Frank Chance graded Authentic by PSA.  It has a tougher Cycle back on it.  Although beat up it still presents well.  I am asking $35.00 but I am happy to take offers also.  Please email me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  if interested .  Payment by paypal if possible but I can work with you if you want to pay another way.

Moved to ebay here is the link.

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/T205-Gold-Boarder-Frank-Chance-PSA-Auth-Cycle-/250874426252?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item3a6947f38c[/url]
email sent.  I will take it

Just got your email Andrew and the card is yours.  Thanks!

Tony Turner
